Hey everyone!

Try out this new rhythm game that'll get your heart pumping!

Introducing HandSaber, the webcam body tracking rhythm game that'll have you slashing to the beat of adrenaline-pumping music. Set in a futuristic world, you'll be surrounded by flying beats as you try to keep up with the rhythm. So put on your dancing shoes and get ready to slash your way to victory!

So what are you waiting for? Get your hands on HandSaber today and experience the ultimate gaming experience!

Gameplay

Blue cubes -> One saber slash
Red cubes -> two saber slash
Green cubes -> One saber slash + 400 score
Orange cubes -> One saber slash - 400 score
Pause game -> press the "q"

Requirements

You just need to a webcam. If you've not a webcam, you can use your phone with pc connection or like a droid cam.

Source Code: https://github.com/creosB/handsaber
